ingredients.ingredient: 4 slices Pepperidge Farm Garlic Texas Toast

cookingTips: Slice onions thinly for even cooking and caramelization
Caramelize onions slowly in butter for 15-20 minutes to develop deep flavor
Use canned soup as a shortcut while still achieving classic French onion soup character
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Help the user understand that slow caramelization of onions is key, even with soup shortcuts, and guide them through assembly with the garlic toast topping.
